greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers of form 3^i*8^j, with i, j >= 0.
comment: Subset of A003586 3-smooth numbers: numbers of the form 2^i*3^j with i, j >= 0. - _Daniel Forgues_, Feb 24 2011
link: Georg Fischer, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..300
mathematica: lim = 262144; Select[Sort[Flatten[Table[3^i 8^j, {i, 0, Log[3, lim]}, {j, 0, Log[8, lim]}]]], # <=lim &] (* _T. D. Noe_, Mar 01 2012 *)
program: (PARI) list(lim)=my(v=List(), N); for(n=0, logint(lim\=1, 3), N=3^n; while(N<=lim, listput(v, N); N<<=3)); Set(v) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 10 2018
results.author: _David W. Wilson_
